mapper.insert:
replace into t_product_in_presale ( id, sku, marketplaceid, groupid, date, quantity, amazonauthid,operator,opttime) values
( #{adv.id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.sku,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.groupid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{adv.quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adv.amazonauthid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.operator,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.opttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select:
select p.sku,p.marketplaceid,p.groupid,p.`start`,p.`end`,max(p.quantity) quantity,max(p.hasdaysales) hasdaysales from t_product_in_presale p left join t_marketplace m on m.marketplaceid=p.marketplaceid where p.sku=#{sku,jdbcType=CHAR} and (p.marketplaceid=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR} or m.region=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR}) and p.groupid=#{groupid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and p.month=CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y'),'-',#{month,jdbcType=CHAR})
and p.date>=CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y'),'-01-01')
group by p.sku,p.marketplaceid,p.groupid,p.`start`,p.`end` order by p.`start`

select p.id,p.sku,p.marketplaceid,p.groupid, p.date, p.quantity, p.operator, p.opttime from t_product_in_presale p left join t_marketplace m on m.marketplaceid=p.marketplaceid where p.sku=#{sku,jdbcType=CHAR} and (p.marketplaceid=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR} or m.region=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR}) and p.groupid=#{groupid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and p.date>=now()

select p.sku,p.marketplaceid,p.groupid,DATE_ADD(p.date,interval -day(p.date)+1 day) date,sum(p.quantity) quantity from t_product_in_presale p left join t_marketplace m on m.marketplaceid=p.marketplaceid where p.sku=#{sku,jdbcType=CHAR} and (p.marketplaceid=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR} or m.region=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR}) and p.groupid=#{groupid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and p.date>=DATE_ADD(now(),interval -day(now()) day) group by p.sku,p.marketplaceid,p.groupid, month(p.date)

SELECT g.name groupname,case when p.marketplaceid='EU' then '欧洲' ELSE m.name END marketplacename,p.sku,p.date ,p.quantity,p.opttime,u.name optname FROM t_product_in_presale p LEFT JOIN t_marketplace m ON p.marketplaceid=m.marketplaceId LEFT JOIN t_amazon_group g ON g.id=p.groupid LEFT JOIN t_userinfo u ON u.id=p.operator WHERE g.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR}
select month,value holiday from t_sys_holiday WHERE marketplaceid=#{marketplaceid,jdbcType=CHAR}
